resources.string: "Mom I am getting late!" I said standing in front of the mirror, checking my appearance. mom emerged out of the kitchen with a tea cup and said "come home a little early today!" "why you going somewhere?" I said as I took the cup from mom. "no, someone's going to visit us today." mom said as she tried to hide her smile. "who?" I asked suspiciously. "I told you about the boy Mr.Mehra recommended, To avoid family drama it was best to say no at the moment.
